i18n.key: Activates or deactivates the zoom on visual elements for visitors using a web browser with a compatible JavaScript engine.
Activates or not add to comparison button.
Shows or hides add to favourite products list button.
Shows or hides the link sharing block for social networking sites (requires the "Link sharing" module).
Shows or hides short description of the product.
Shows or hides the prices incl. taxes, or uses the setting specified on the shop associated to the current website.
Shows or hides prices excl. taxes, or uses the settings specified on the shop associated with the current web site.
For products containing sub-products (kits and product groups), make links to pages these sub-products?
